desc: Order today for Padella at Home Meal Kits, Pasta Kits and more, delivered right to your door. Nationwide delivery available.

layout.text:
WE'LL BE TAKING A BREAK FROM OUR ONLINE SHOP TO FOCUS ON REOPENING OUR RESTAURANTS
  KEEP AN EYE ON OUR SOCIAL SOCIAL PAGES AS WE WILL BRING OUR LOVED PASTA KITS BACK IN THE FUTURE
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT IN THE PAST MONTHS
